Class MainFormController

java.lang.Object
com.example.c482project.MainFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainFormController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Handles every element that exists on the Main Screen.

    • partSearchTextFieldClicked

      public void partSearchTextFieldClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method handles the part search text field. This method allows the users to search for part either by id or name. This method allows the users to perform partial searches. Searches aren't case-sensitive. The method will show an error message if the part searched is not found.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - part search field clicked.

    • addPartButtonClicked

      public void addPartButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method handles the part add button. The method opens up the Add Part Screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - add button clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException.

    • partModifyButtonClicked

      public void partModifyButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method handles the part modify button. This method launches the modify part screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - part modify button clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • partDeleteButtonClicked

      public void partDeleteButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method handles the part delete button. The method shows an error message if no part was selected. The method shows a confirmation message asking user to confirm before deleting the part. If the user clicks cancel, then nothing happens and the part will not be removed.
      Parameters:
      event - part delete button clicked.

    • productSearchTextFieldClicked

      public void productSearchTextFieldClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method handles the product search text field. This method allows users to search for product by id or name. Searches aren't case-sensitive. The method allows users to perform partial searches. The method shows an error message if the product searched is not found.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - product search field clicked.

    • addProductButtonClicked

      public void addProductButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method handles the product add button. The method launches the Add Product Screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - add product button clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException.

    • modifyProductButtonClicked

      public void modifyProductButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method handles the product modify button. The method launches the Modify Product Screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - modify product button clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException

    • productDeleteButtonClicked

      public void productDeleteButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method handles the product delete button. The method shows an error message if no product was selected for deletion. The method shows a confirmation message before removing the product. The method prevents the users from deleting a product that has one or more associated parts. The user must delete all associated parts before they can delete the product.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - product delete button clicked.
